name: Bilateral Thalamic Infarction Syndrome
chief_complaint: I feel like I'm in a fog and can't remember anything from this morning
prognosis: Guarded - significant risk for persistent memory deficits and executive dysfunction, though motor symptoms may improve with time
description: A rare stroke syndrome caused by occlusion of the artery of Percheron, a variant thalamic blood supply. Results in simultaneous infarction of both medial thalami and often the midbrain. Disrupts memory circuits, consciousness modulation, and vertical eye movement pathways.
